channel.title: Posts on Steven Korvin's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Steven Korvin's Website

item.title: There's Nothing to Buy
item.description:
All my life, I’ve never understood what, to me, is commercialist nonsense. It’s not my ethics or my values. I just don’t understand it all.

Life has been tough for me, though, so I’ve bought a lot of things with my limited income. Buying all those things had satiated personal stress, but it gave me additional stress. I don’t care about the things that I’ve bought.

After two years struggling in Computer Science doing school online at Oregon State University, I’m now doing well in my Cybersecurity Technology program at University of Maryland Global Campus.

I’ve gotten rid of all those nonsensical hobbies in my life. Those hobbies helped pass the time and they stimulated my mind. They were overstimulation, though. I can’t watch a movie or a TV show. I have difficulties with music. Now, I’ve gotten video games out of my life, too. So, I’m focusing on information security-related things in the ways that I’m able to. I’ll be attending BSides Connecticut on September 21st!

item.title: Move to Anatole Theme
item.description:
With the uBlogger theme no longer maintained, I have moved this site to the Anatole Hugo theme, which can be found here: https://github.com/lxndrblz/anatole

Credit for this theme goes to all contributors behind its development.

item.title: EVC Project Photographs
item.description: I tried to make photographs of the Electric Vehicle Conversion project look snazzy in the uBlogger Hugo theme. I’m just going to direct you to an album in my PixelFed account instead: http://link.stevenkorvin.com/PG8kwp
